title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & other LLMs packaged as runnable macOS/Linux/Win binaries with a built-in REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API; works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, RAG).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client for Ollama written in Rust with keyboard-driven chat.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template that speaks to Ollama via the ollama-js package.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying, fine-tuning and integrating Ollama models.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Ready-made Docker Compose stack with Ollama and NVIDIA runtime for GPU inference.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators and embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets a server chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with context and streaming support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-node
summary: npm package (official JS client) downloaded 100k+ times for chatting with Ollama.

title: ollama-python PyPI
summary: Official Python package on PyPI providing sync/async APIs to Ollama.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting and showcasing Ollama projects.
